name: build-version-utility
goal: Add a simple utility function to demonstrate and test the autonomous agent loop system.

userStories.title: Add getBuildVersion utility function
userStories.description: Add a function `getBuildVersion(): string` to `src/core/utils.ts` that reads the version from package.json and returns it.

userStories.title: Write tests for getBuildVersion
userStories.description: Add tests to `test/core/utils.test.ts` that verify the function returns the correct version and handles edge cases.
acceptanceCriteria: Test file test/core/utils.test.ts includes tests for getBuildVersion
Tests verify function returns a string

userStories.title: Document the utility
userStories.description: Update or create an AGENTS.md file to document when and how to use the getBuildVersion utility.
